name: GiftVault ltd
overview:
Luxury Gifting with a Social Network Twist GiftVault.com is the ultimate online destination for beautiful luxury gifts – many available exclusively via the site. But it is also much more.

-GiftVault is a gifts emporium curated by luxury experts. -GiftVault is a social gifting network developed by new media specialists. GiftVault is your gift planner.
GiftVault welcomes special requests, both for corporate clients and unforgettable occasions.

Handpicked, meticulously curated gifts, from Missoni throws to Christofle silverware, mini trees made entirely of sweets and handcrafted leather games, lovingly packaged and shipped to customers, are GiftVault’s forte - as are gifts not found anywhere else online, like De Grisogono’s sumptuous leather bags or a showstopping Superleggera & Lazerian bespoke carbon fibre coffee table. GiftVault’s forthright, glamorous and passionate owners Lee Greenberg and Violetta Winkworth- Gruosi know social networks are pivotal to future expansion. The GiftVault Social Network makes buying the right gift for the right person easy and fun. GiftVault users share wishlists, gift ideas and experiences; upload videos; discuss how to make an occasion perfect; surprise friends with gifts without having to ask their shoe size; shop via Facebook; and post favourite products on their wall. The GiftVault Planner ensures users receive sms/email reminders of special occasions along with friends’ updated wishlists.
